title: 30->60 ping Na servers
body: My ping was stable 30 or below about 3-4 days ago, but now my ping is 60 why did it double? I checked in with my isp and they said that it might be an issue with your game servers.

replies.body: Your increased ping may be due to a new routing by your ISP taking the long way to our game servers.  We can find the route your network is taking by running a [traceroute](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2).  [Submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to player support, and our tech team can take a look at your routing and provide some options for you.  We'll review your specific issue and help get this sorted out!
